Service Details: - Searches for a cure for Type 1 diabetes through both research funding and advocacy- Locally provides support through the T1D Parent Group Meetings, community events and fundraisers such as the annual TELUS Walk to Cure Diabetes and the Starlight Gala
How to Apply: Available to anyone who would like to learn more about or support Type 1 Diabetes
Meetings: Please contact us for next T1D Parent Group Meeting date.
